select b.* from pltf_citem_auth_rl a, pltf_citem b where a.fg_delete='N' and b.fg_visible='Y' and b.fg_delete='N' and a.p_seq=#{pSeq} and a.c_seq=b.c_seq order by b.sort, a.car_seq
